question: Tolkappiyam Mapuranam, Isainunukam, Bhutapuranam, Kali, Kuruku, Vendali are the important works of which of the following sangams?
explanation: Tolkappiyam Mapuranam, Isainunukam, Bhutapuranam, Kali, Kuruku, Vendali are the important works of second sangam. In the second sangam there were 3700 poetsÂ which was patronised by 59 kings and lasted for 3700 years.
